thread.title: Kanna Gets Her Due As "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid" Manga Spin-Off Collected
thread.title_full: Kanna Gets Her Due As "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid" Manga Spin-Off Collected

author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
title: Kanna Gets Her Due As "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid" Manga Spin-Off Collected
text:
The Kobayashi household got a bit bigger today with the Japanese release of  Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid ' s spin-off manga  Kanna no Nichijō/Kanna's Everday Life.  The series by Mitsuhiro Kimura ( Dullahan-chan is Head Over Heels ) launched last year in Monthly Action , the home magazine of Coolkyoushinja's ( I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying ,  Komori-san Can't Decline! ) 2013 original series.
 

 
 Store exclusive bonuses

 
volume 2 of the spin-off tribute anthology was released March 11th

 
volume 5 of the main series was released back in December

 
On the anime front,  Masumi Itō's cover art for the original sound track, due April 12th, was revealed 
【サントラCD】4月12日発売の伊藤真澄によるオリジナルサウンドトラック 「小林さんちのイシュカン・ミュージック」 描き下ろしイラスト公開中！ ※実際のジャケットデザインとは異なります。 #maidragon pic.twitter.com/B2Oz1BO3cc 
— TVアニメ小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式 (@maidragon_anime) March 27, 2017 

 
via Natalie 
 


Scott Green is editor and reporter for anime and manga at geek entertainment site  Ain't It Cool News . Follow him on Twitter at  @aicnanime .
